page.title: 18My schoolday at Rolvenden(2)
page.content: Our school dinners come in tins. Today it is beefburgers, chips and sweetcorn with Swiss buns and milk shake for pudding. At dinner the three classes are mixed up. When the plates are cleared away, one of us reads out tomorrow's menu. You get to do that if you have a birthday(or your Mum does). { We play outside on the grass or the {playing field if it's fine. In the {afternoon lessons we sometimes have {Games, P.E. or Drama.} At 3.15 we go home. I change and go out to play with my friends. We go down to the woods where our camp is. We clear away some dead leaves from the pond near our camp before tea. { Then I watch television or play a {game. Sometimes I read my Pony comic {and put on the cassette recorder until {it is time to go to bed at 9 o'clock, {and that's the end of another day.
